      <p>
       Enchantment Ink is pleased to introduce the latest volume in its series of full-color guides to American illustrators, "Roses of Romance: A Collector's Guide to Bradshaw Crandell" by Norman I. Platnick.  
  Several years in the making, this new volume brings together everything known about Crandell's printed works, including full-color images of all his known magazine covers, illustrations, and ads; 
fans, 
blotters, and postcards; book illustrations (including his risque works for the Dutch Treat Club's annual volumes); booklets, leaflets, and menus; boxes, tins, and trays; miscellaneous items; posters; and, 
of course, his many fantastic print and calendar images, including those for the Gerlach-Barklow, Coca-Cola, and other companies.  The volume includes over 650 color images on 106 8.5x11 inch, 
velo-bound 
pages, plus a 
detailed, 12-page index/size &amp; price guide.
      </p>
